sn45.28:1.2: “Ariyam vo, bhikkhave, sammasamadhim desessami saupanisam saparikkharam.
sn45.28:1.4: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, ariyo sammasamadhi saupaniso saparikkharo?
sn45.28:1.6: Ya kho, bhikkhave, imehi sattahangehi cittassa ekaggata saparikkharata—
sn45.28:1.7: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyo sammasamadhi saupaniso itipi saparikkharo itipi”ti.
